course_title: Mastering Dog Walking Business Management with Dog Dollars
description: Learn how to run your dog walking business like a pro with Dog Dollars, a comprehensive platform for managing bookings, schedules, walkers, clients, payments, and report cards.

lessons.title: Introduction to Dog Dollars
lessons.description: Overview of Dog Dollars features and benefits for dog walking businesses

lessons.title: Signing Up and Setting Up Your Account
lessons.description: Step-by-step guide to creating an account and setting up your business profile

lessons.title: Navigating the Dashboard
lessons.description: Tour of the Dog Dollars dashboard and key features

lessons.title: Managing Clients and Their Pets
lessons.description: How to add, edit, and manage client and pet information

lessons.title: Creating and Managing Bookings
lessons.description: How to schedule and manage bookings, including recurring bookings and schedule blocks

lessons.title: Using the Drag-and-Drop Calendar
lessons.description: Tips and tricks for using the drag-and-drop calendar to manage your bookings

lessons.title: Adding and Managing Walkers
lessons.description: How to add, edit, and manage walker information and assignments

lessons.title: Using the Mobile App
lessons.description: How walkers can use the mobile app to check in, take photos, and leave notes

lessons.title: Managing Walker Schedules and Assignments
lessons.description: How to assign bookings to walkers and manage their schedules

lessons.title: Generating Invoices and Managing Payments
lessons.description: How to generate invoices and manage online payments

lessons.title: Connecting Your Stripe Account
lessons.description: How to connect your Stripe account to Dog Dollars for seamless payments

lessons.title: Managing Refunds and Cancellations
lessons.description: How to handle refunds and cancellations in Dog Dollars

lessons.title: Using Report Cards
lessons.description: How to create and send report cards to clients, including photos and notes

lessons.title: Understanding Business Analytics
lessons.description: How to use Dog Dollars analytics to track revenue, walker performance, and client retention

lessons.title: Customizing Your Reporting
lessons.description: How to customize your reporting to meet your business needs

lessons.title: Using GPS Tracking
lessons.description: How to use GPS tracking to provide clients with detailed walk information

lessons.title: Customizing Your Domain
lessons.description: How to customize your domain and branding in Dog Dollars

lessons.title: Advanced Settings and Configuration
lessons.description: How to configure advanced settings, including notification preferences and walk packages
